title: Хаб Отдела дереализации
source:
[[include theme:minimalist-bhl]]

[[module CSS]]
:root {
     --header-title: "Отдел дереализации";
     --header-subtitle: "Мы создаём       из дереального";
     --lgurl: url('https://files.scpfoundation.net/local--files/unreality-hub/Unreality%20Header%20Logo.svg');
}

a.newpage {
	color: #d61 !important;
}
[[/module]]

[[>]]
[[module Rate]]
[[/>]]

[[div class="blockquote"]]
Ув. [Имя],

Рад видеть вас в [Наименование отдела], добро пожаловать. Среди ваших коллег выбрали именно вас благодаря [Актуальный опыт работы] и [Положительное личностное качество].

Данный отдел специализируется на конкретном виде аномальных явлений, который затрагивает [Сведения о специфике данного отдела].

[Абзацы, дополняющие вышеуказанное, с подробным описанием актуальных обязанностей данного отдела].

С наилучшими пожеланиями,

Джон Доу
Директор
Отдел дереализации
[[/div]]

@@ @@
@@ @@
@@ @@

[[div class="blockquote"]]
[[=]]
+ [НАЖМИТЕ, ЧТОБЫ ОТРЕДАКТИРОВАТЬ]
//Составные единицы деконструкции.//
//(Расположены в хронологическом порядке.)//
[[/=]]
[[/div]]


[[div class="blockquote"]]
[[[unreality-orientation|]]] – за авторством [*http://www.wikidot.com/user:info/Fishish Fishish].

//Я хватаю бейгл и отправляюсь вглубь Зоны 19.//
[[/div]]


[[div class="blockquote"]]
[[[your-imaginary-friend |]]] – за авторством [*http://www.wikidot.com/user:info/Fishish Fishish] и [*http://www.wikidot.com/user:info/Deadly-Bread Deadly Bread].

//Slowly, I try solving a puzzle with no real pieces.//
[[/div]]


[[div class="blockquote"]]
[[[something-glowing |]]] – за авторством [*http://www.wikidot.com/user:info/Deadly-Bread Deadly Bread].

//all ancillary functions will be moved to preventing subjective reality loss during this process.//
[[/div]]

[[div class="blockquote"]]
[[[the-castaway-from-unreality | The Castaway From Unreality]]] – за авторством [*http://www.wikidot.com/user:info/Fishish Fishish].

//In the time I've been at Site-19, I've done maybe one or two things that could be considered actual work.//
[[/div]]

[[div class="blockquote"]]
[[[its-not-real-it-never-was-you-pathetic-fools | It's Not Real, It Never Was, You Pathetic Fools]]] – за авторством [*http://www.wikidot.com/user:info/Fishish Fishish].

//Material Requirements: Nothing. (Already in my possession)//
[[/div]]

[[div class="blockquote"]]
[[[SCP-6208|]]] – за авторством [*http://www.wikidot.com/user:info/Elunerazim Elunerazim] и [*http://www.wikidot.com/user:info/Fishish Fishish].

//Персонал Фонда должен быть осведомлён о существовании Отдела Дереализации.//
[[/div]]

[[div class="blockquote"]]
[[[SCP-6938|]]] – за авторством [*http://www.wikidot.com/user:info/Uncle-Nicolini Uncle Nicolini] и [*http://www.wikidot.com/user:info/Fishish Fishish].

//"Есть возражения?"//
[[/div]]

[[div class="blockquote"]]
[[[haunt-me | Haunt Me, Haunt Me, Haunt Me]]] – за авторством [*http://www.wikidot.com/user:info/Fishish Fishish].

//The morning sun hates you, and everything hurts.//
[[/div]]

[[div class="blockquote"]]
[[[disintegration | Disintegration]]] – за авторством [*http://www.wikidot.com/user:info/Fishish Fishish].

**[02.39 AM] -- Alex Thorley:**  I'm scared of blood.
[[/div]]

[[div class="blockquote"]]
[[[unreality-hub | SCP-001-NULL - Предложение Fishish]]] – за авторством [*http://www.wikidot.com/user:info/Fishish Fishish].

//Мы встретимся вновь. Как и было всегда.//
[[/div]]
@@ @@
@@ @@
@@ @@
@@ @@
-----
@@ @@
@@ @@
@@ @@
@@ @@
[[div class="blockquote"]]

@@@@

= **Столовая Зоны 19**

//Заказ #: 000000 @@ @@ @@ @@ @@ @@ Посетитель: 7
Кассир: Н/Д @@ @@ @@ @@ @@ @@ @@ @@ 18:24:30
13.02.2021//

-----

1 Простой бейгл 1,75

1 Бутылка воды 0,99

-----

//Промежуточный итог: 2,74
12% НДС: 0,32//

**Итого: 3,06**

[[/div]]
@@ @@
@@ @@
@@ @@
@@ @@

[[=]]
> + На последнем издыхании
> //Отдельные рассказы, связанные с Отделом дереализации (единственное число).//

[[div class="blockquote"]]
[[[burger | Alex Thorley Eats A Burger]]] – за авторством [*http://www.wikidot.com/user:info/syuzhet syuzhet].

//The smell of cooked meat, the taste of it on your tongue, the soft fat oozing from between the edges of your teeth.//

//It's a nice thing to be able to eat real food for once.//

[[/div]]

[[div class="blockquote"]]
[[[bagel|Alex Thorley Hungers For a Bagel]]] – за авторством [*http://www.wikidot.com/user:info/JakdragonX JakdragonX].

//Oh, speaking of feeling things: I'm still hungry.//
[[/div]]

[[div class="blockquote"]]
[[[unreal sushi| alex thorley dreams of sushi.]]] – за авторством [*http://www.wikidot.com/user:info/LORDXVNV LORDXVNV].

//You would expect an ocean this big to have actual waves, but it's just ripples. They're just there. They'll never crash onto the shore. There won't ever be a climax.//

[[/div]]

[[div class="blockquote"]]
[[[the-blank-page | The Blank Page]]] – за авторством [*http://www.wikidot.com/user:info/Prismal Prismal].

//You stare at the empty page, scared.//

[[/div]]

[[div class="blockquote"]]
[[[a-thorley-little-christmas | Alex Thorley's Christmas Special]]] – за авторством [*http://www.wikidot.com/user:info/FLOORBOARDS FLOORBOARDS].

//After [Period of time of employment.] we are [Sad/relived/excited.] to see you go. Your transfer from [Insert former Department here.] to [Insert current Department here.] has been approved. We are thankful you have continued to dutifully serve the Foundation in our mission.//

[[/div]]

[[div class="blockquote"]]
[[[alex-thorley-goes-on-a-blind-date| Alex Thorley Goes on a Blind Date]]] – за авторством [*http://www.wikidot.com/user:info/IronShears IronShears].

//You are Alex Thorley. You have been waiting for 30 minutes.//

[[/div]]

[[div class="blockquote"]]
[[[give-me-back-to-the-sky |Give me Back to the Sky]]] – за авторством [*http://www.wikidot.com/user:info/Fishish Fishish].

//You have never felt better, which makes you nauseous.//

[[/div]]

[[div class="blockquote"]]
[[[poem |Alex Thorley Writes A Poem]]] – за авторством [*http://www.wikidot.com/user:info/IndustryStandard IndustryStandard].

//You don't need to know your hands // if you do no work.//

[[/div]]

[[div class="blockquote"]]
[[[illcovetyouifyoucoverme |ILLCOVETYOUIFYOUCOVERME]]] – за авторством [*http://www.wikidot.com/user:info/FLOORBOARDS FLOORBOARDS].

//**Kindness:** But the defense of love remains where it was: Standing on the bastion of the night, overlooking the red dawn where one day the sky will be painted with yellow stars as well.//

//[**Donald John Trump** exits from behind the podium. He smiles widely and repeatedly bows. He waves both his hands. He looks back and forth.]//

[[/div]]

[[div class="blockquote"]]
[[[sundial|Sundial]]] – за авторством [*http://www.wikidot.com/user:info/Aftokrator Aftokrator].

//What is the inverse of a human being?//

[[/div]]

[[div class="blockquote"]]
[[[magazine|Maga zine]]] – за авторством [*http://www.wikidot.com/user:info/Prismal Prismal].

//Open?//

[[/div]]

[[div class="blockquote"]]
[[[drama|Alex Thorley in A Dramatic Irony]]] – за авторством [*http://www.wikidot.com/user:info/Cyvstvi Cyvstvi].

//**ALEX THORLEY**//
@@    @@//I’m just going through the motions. That’s all.//

[[/div]]

[[div class="blockquote"]]
[[[alex-thorley-confuses-a-guy|Alex Thorley Confuses a Guy]]] – за авторством [*http://www.wikidot.com/user:info/Kothardarastrix Kothardarastrix].

//"I don’t not do anything."//

[[/div]]

[[div class="blockquote"]]
[[[baroque-unreality|**BAROQUE**]]] – за авторством [*http://www.wikidot.com/user:info/Fishish Fishish].

//How this make u feel white boy//

[[/div]]

[[div class="blockquote"]]
[[[Scatterbrained|scatterbrained.]]] – за авторством [*http://www.wikidot.com/user:info/Troutmaskreplica Troutmaskreplica].

//god, what am i doing?//

[[/div]]

> + [ДОСТУП ЗАПРЕЩЁН]
> //Отдельные объекты, связанные с Отделом дереализации (множественное число).//

[[div class="blockquote"]]
[[[scp-5863|SCP-5863 – Myths Made Plain]]] – за авторством [*http://www.wikidot.com/user:info/SynthPanda_ SynthPanda_].

//The nature of SCP-5863 is currently unknown to the Foundation. The following proposed explanations are currently under investigation.//
[[/div]]

[[div class="blockquote"]]
[[[scp-0983 | SCP-983 – The Party is Today]]] – за авторством [*http://www.wikidot.com/user:info/FLOORBOARDS FLOORBOARDS].

//I can't keep pretending these aren't presents from myself.//

[[/div]]

[[div class="blockquote"]]
[[[scp-6478|SCP-6478 – Not Dementia - It's Something Else]]] – за авторством [*http://www.wikidot.com/user:info/Quicksilvers Quicksilvers].

//The results and side effects of ingesting SCP-6478-1 are inconclusive.//

[[/div]]

[[div class="blockquote"]]
[[[SCP-6558|SCP-6558 – Word Disassociation]]] – за авторством [*http://www.wikidot.com/user:info/tstaffor tstaffor].

//**Special Containment Procedures:** Containment.//

[[/div]]

[[div class="blockquote"]]
[[[SCP-7591|SCP-7591 – Alex Thorley Kills A Guy]]] – за авторством [*http://www.wikidot.com/user:info/PlaguePJP PlaguePJP].

//**Lague:** Have you ever had violent thoughts?//

[[/div]]

[[div class="blockquote"]]
[[[SCP-7195|SCP-7195 – Alex Thorley Gets A Cat]]] – за авторством [*http://www.wikidot.com/user:info/Prismal Prismal].

//Thorley meows.//

//SCP-7195 meows.//
[[/div]]

[[div class="blockquote"]]
[[[SCP-7356|SCP-7356 – Noncanonical Materials]]] – за авторством [*http://www.wikidot.com/user:info/FLOORBOARDS FLOORBOARDS].

//Those in the presence of SCP-7356 have not reported adverse effects. However, assigned ritualists — even those who had been amnesticized — have reported experiencing dreams depicting an unknown species of bird, possibly a crow or raven, gliding down a hallway.//

[[/div]]

[[div class="blockquote"]]
[[[SCP-7365|SCP-7365 – Take/Off/Day]]] – за авторством [*http://www.wikidot.com/user:info/IndustryStandard IndustryStandard].

//Congratulations! You have won (earned) a complementary, all-expenses-paid, trip around the world!//

[[/div]]

[[div class="blockquote"]]
[[[SCP-6352|SCP-6352 – Mother Died Today]]] – за авторством [*http://www.wikidot.com/user:info/fabuIa fabuIa].

//You are not a member of the Department of Unreality. This does not concern you.//

[[/div]]

[[div class="blockquote"]]
[[[SCP-7488|SCP-7488 – anything for your eyes]]] – за авторством [*http://www.wikidot.com/user:info/winkwonkboi winkwonkboi].

//They all died, screaming. SCP-7488 wields a gun. The bullets are painted in kaleidoscopic hues.//
[[/div]]

[[div class="blockquote"]]
[[[SCP-7413|SCP-7413 – Rhizomatic Serial Killer]]] – за авторством [*http://www.wikidot.com/user:info/FLOORBOARDS FLOORBOARDS].

//Several calls were made to the police precinct of northern ████████, ██████, USA, in which a low, androgynous voice stated "there is a killer on the loose" before hanging up.//
[[/div]]

[[div class="blockquote"]]
[[[SCP-8993|SCP-8993 – embody]]] – за авторством [*http://www.wikidot.com/user:info/SynthPanda_ SynthPanda_].

//While the SCP-8993 CORE will regain what was lost, it will never regain its shape.//
[[/div]]

[[div class="blockquote"]]
[[[SCP-8591|SCP-8591 ⁠— Alex Thorley Doesn’t Get Away With It]]] – за авторством [*http://www.wikidot.com/user:info/PlaguePJP PlaguePJP].

**Thorley:** //(On the phone)// It’s here again.
[[/div]]

[[div class="blockquote"]]
[[[SCP-8195|SCP-8195 ⁠— Alex Thorley Gets Away With It]]] – за авторством [*http://www.wikidot.com/user:info/Syuzhet Syuzhet].

**Thorley:** //(On the phone)// Yeah, no, that's okay.
**Thorley:** Like... chicken? No, that's fine. Just get that one instead.
**Thorley:** Yep.
**Thorley:** No, really, it's   it's okay. We'll talk about it later, okay?
**Thorley:**
**Thorley:** Love you, bye.
[[/div]]

[[div class="blockquote"]]
[[[SCP-7646|SCP-7646 ⁠— Alex Thorley is Implicated in the DuPont Teflon Scandal]]] – за авторством [*http://www.wikidot.com/user:info/Billith Billith].

//The consequences of SCP-7646's existence, as well as the existence of similar events, are to be ameliorated in perpetuity by the ongoing efforts of **OPERATION ALEX THORLEY DRINKS 700+ GLASSES OF WATER**.//
[[/div]]

[[div class="blockquote"]]
[[[SCP-8797|SCP-8797— The Collected Works of Alex Thorley]]] – за авторством [*http://www.wikidot.com/user:info/Tufto Tufto].
//SCP-8797 has been discontinued as a result of reader disinterest. We thank you for your interest in [publishing company] and encourage you to check out our works by other authors, such as://
[[/div]]

[[div class="blockquote"]]
[[[SCP-7825|SCP-7825 — Thorley Minus Thorley]]] – за авторством [*http://www.wikidot.com/user:info/troutmaskreplica troutmaskreplica].
//**Special Containment Procedures:** Alex Thorley is the sole individual responsible for the research and containment of SCP-7825.//
[[/div]]
@@ @@

> + НУЛЛИСОМИЯ
> //A veces dejo de respirar por un instante..//

[[div class="blockquote"]]
[http://scp-int.wikidot.com/scp-cn-2186  SCP-CN-2186 - Alex Thorley每次回办公室都看到同事在装死] – за авторством [*http://www.wikidot.com/user:info/sjx07 sjx07].

//Alex Thorley had died at Alex Thorley's hands a few times, but Alex Thorley was still alive, still writing this document, still able to kill Alex Thorley if they so wished.//

[[/div]]

[[div class="blockquote"]]
[[[SCP-031-VN | SCP-031-VN - Listen To The Whispers Of The Unreals]]] – за авторством [*http://www.wikidot.com/user:info/Welpermander Welpermander].

//**[DATA IRRELEVANT]:** Unreality is so basic, so easy to comprehend. You are but a burden to everyone. Nobody here is not disappointed with you.//

[[/div]]

[[div class="blockquote"]]
[[[SCP-ZH-161 |SCP-ZH-161 - Alex Thorley Works From 9 To 5]]] – за авторством [*http://www.wikidot.com/user:info/Kikunai Kikunai].

//**Mouse and Keyboard:** Frequently being pressed; of which frequency of the mouse's usage is higher than that of the keyboard.//

[[/div]]
@@ @@
@@ @@
@@ @@
@@ @@
-----
@@ @@
@@ @@
@@ @@
@@ @@
> + [ПАМЯТЬ НЕ РАСПРЕДЕЛЕНА]
> //Картины того, что лежит между строк.//

[[div class="blockquote"]]

<<Они -- Алекс Торли>> за авторством [*http://www.wikidot.com/user:info/LOVEMARGINAL LOVEMARGINAL]

[[=image wk864MQ.png]]

[[/div]]

[[div class="blockquote"]]

<<витрувианские торли и кот в коробке, #FFFFFF, #000000>> за авторством [*http://www.wikidot.com/user:info/LORDXVNV LORDXVNV]

[[=image altcQ6o.jpeg]]

[[/div]]

[[div class="blockquote"]]

<<Дональду Трампу и другим 19 людям штатом Джорджия предъявлено обвинение в нелегальной попытке сорвать выборы 2020 года>> за авторством [*http://www.wikidot.com/user:info/SynthPanda_ SynthPanda_]

[[=image QZLMvvQ.png]]

[[/div]]

[[div class="blockquote"]]

<<Алекс Торли нажимает кнопку "escape">> за авторством [*http://www.wikidot.com/user:info/Kikunai Kikunai]

[[image WfKbub4.png style="width:100%;" link=#]]

[[/div]]

[[/=]]

@@ @@
@@ @@
@@ @@

[[=]]
+ Что это такое?
[[/=]]

--Неплохая попытка, товарищ майор.--

Отдел дереализации -- это подразделение[[footnote]]Несмотря на возражения со стороны АПАИБ, Комитета по этике, представителя Отдела в реальности и автора.[[/footnote]] Организации, которое имеет дело с определённым набором аномалий. Чтобы в это поверить, нужно постараться это не видеть.

Раздел **[НАЖМИТЕ, ЧТОБЫ ОТРЕДАКТИРОВАТЬ]** охватывает первоначальные статьи, написанные командой <<The Wiggles Hate Each Other in Real Life>> в рамках конкурса <<DEPARTMENTCON 2022>>[[footnote]]Конкурс англофонда. - прим. переводчика.[[/footnote]], а также их продолжение за авторством [*http://www.wikidot.com/user:info/Fishish Fishish].

В то время как Отдел можно трактовать по-разному, всё же добавлять в хаб можно только те статьи, которые внутренне согласуются с уже существующими. При наличии вопросов обращайтесь к [*http://www.wikidot.com/user:info/Fishish Fishish] через личные сообщения Викидота или через Discord.

##red|Примечание для руфонда и для переводчиков.## По поводу внесения статей лучше обращайтесь к указанному пользователю во избежание недопониманий. Кроме того, у Алекс Торли нет пола. Совсем. И Алекс Торли -- это несколько человек и один человек одновременно. Крепитесь, текст придётся адаптировать, и это будет трудно. Или забудьте и оставьте хаб на мне. -- [[user John_Lyetacker]]

@@ @@
@@ @@
@@ @@

[[=]]
+ Как писать

[[collapsible show="+ Как писать" hide="- Закрыть"]]

[[/collapsible]]

##transparent|Статья должна быть хорошей.##
##transparent|Держите одно из правил на халяву: с точки зрения отдела, Алекс Торли -- единственный существующий сотрудник.##

[[/=]]
